data.text: Yahweh, you are able to get revenge on your enemies.
You are the one who judges all people on the earth;
Yahweh, how long will those wicked people be glad/happy?
They do evil things, and they boast about doing them;
Yahweh, it is as though those wicked people crush us, your people;
They murder widows and orphans
Those wicked people say, “Yahweh does not see anything;
You evil people who rule Israel, you are foolish and stupid;
God made our ears;
He also scolds the leaders of other nations;
Yahweh knows everything that people are thinking;
Yahweh, you are pleased with people who want you to discipline/correct them,
When those people have had troubles, you cause those troubles to cease,
Yahweh will not abandon his people;
Some day judges will decide matters fairly for people,
But when wicked people ◄oppressed me/treated me cruelly►,
If Yahweh had not helped me at that time,
I said/thought to myself, “I am about to die,”
Whenever I am very worried,
You have nothing to do with wicked judges,
They plan to get rid of righteous people,
But Yahweh ◄has become like my fortress/protects me► [MET];
He will punish those wicked leaders in return for the wicked things that they have done,
